answers.answer: The PTSD Help app is designed to be a free assistant for managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The app provides essential information about PTSD, a self-assessment module for symptoms, practical tools for managing discomfort, crisis support contacts, and detailed information about professional treatments.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app assists with symptoms by offering a self-assessment module for understanding them and practical tools for managing associated discomfort.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app provides crisis support contacts, but the specific contacts are not detailed in the given content.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app provides detailed information about available professional treatments, but the content does not specify what those treatments are.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app was developed in partnership with the US Department of Veterans Affairs - National Center for PTSD.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app is available for Android and iOS platforms.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The app is aimed at vulnerable people affected by the crisis in Ukraine, including refugees and those still in Ukraine, and also people in vulnerable situations affected by any traumatic impact such as war, violence, aggression, or accidents.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.
